reviews.review: I love it! First time in my life I gonna buy another ticket to see same movie twice in a theater.
Awesome Just so awesome Sad in the end tho
Totally a different level of movie experience.. Awesome movie. :D

Avengers Infinity Wars is a great movie, absolutely well paced and well realized. Every character gets their bit and once it starts it builds in tempo until the stunning finale. Go see it before someone spoils it for you.
Words and stuff. Omg. I should write this later. Holy s***.

4/27/2018
With due respect to the folks who have not seen this, I will just be raving how it has been action filled from the get go. Not complaining too that it was too star studded as it's a given and the culmination and divergence of all the Marvel Universe substories. Probably the only complaint we had, completely minor, is that the characters were wisecracks almost every minute of the film whenever there's a dialogue. Overall though, still worth the trip to the cinemas, which we seldom do nowadays.

My name is Phillip and my dad is really rich so he got his hands on a video copy of infinity war. We watch in my house movie theater, and I am so upset. At least half of the avengers get dropped by Thanos and he gets away!!!! The movie is almost 3 hours long, there was so much build up for them all to die. The good guys are suppose to win, what the hell is wrong with you marvel?!?!

Holy...f'n...shit!!!
I am so glad that i could be alive to watch this movie. It...is...AMAZING!!! Thanos absolutely killed every scene he was in, making it a rare occurrence for Marvel films where the villian is actually memorable. The directors weren't kidding, you'll see why Thanos is the biggest, most threatening villain in the entire MCU within the first five minutes.
Do yourself a favour and watch this masterpiece of a film. 10 years in the making and it exceeded my expectations by far. 

10/10
The greatest movie in the entire MCU and quite possibly one of the greatest superhero films of all time
Please be good... Please be good... Please be good...
